did.head: Papers Summary
did.abstract: The Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright papers are composed of legal and personal documents pertaining to the family of Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright, a Texas pastor and president of Waco Female College 1883-1887.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright was born in Clarksville, Tennessee, on 1838 February 1. We know little of his life until his marriage to Mary Wyatt Harris, the seventh child of John Wyatt Harris and Judith Eldridge Cox, in Russellville, Alabama. Wright and his wife moved with their family to Lorena, Texas, in 1870, when Pastor Wright preached at Stanford’s Chapel. Samuel and Mary had nine children, eight of whom survived into adulthood. Reverend Samuel Wright later served as president of Waco Female College from 1883 to 1887 after which he served as Presiding Elder for the Northwest Texas Conference. No exact date of death for Rev. Samuel Pascal Wright has been found.

Mrs. C.N. McCulley is the descendant of Reverend Wright who collected and compiled the material in a single location. In February 2013, she donated the collected materials to the Historic Waco Foundation, who then donated the items to the Texas Collection in 2013 August.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright papers are completely genealogical in scope. These items include: birth, marriage, and death certificates, photographs of a family home and family members, obituaries and newspaper clippings, personal correspondence between friends and family, and first-person genealogical narratives from family members.

The materials found within the collection detail the genealogy of Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright’s descendants, as well as provides genealogical information regarding the Barcus and Harris families. The papers begin in 1874 with marriage certificates and conclude in 1992, many years after Reverend Wright’s death.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright papers were compiled into one folder on receipt, with no apparent organization. Because of the genealogical nature of the materials, the papers were organized by material type.
Currently, the Reverend Samuel Pascal Wright papers are arranged in one series, I. Genealogy.

relatedmaterial.archref: Two portraits of Mary Wyatt Harris and Samuel Pascal Wright are referenced within the collection, but are on display at the Earle-Napier-Kinnard House of Waco.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: The Genealogy series consists of collected genealogical information regarding the descendants of Samuel Pascal Wright. Items in this collection are both created by individual persons and official public records. The material type ranges from oral histories and photographs, to legal documents and correspondence.
